author: Casebook
description: Casebook is a general purpose, static timeline presentation UI
name: casebook

scripts.copy: mkdirp public/casebook  && ncp src/favicon.ico public/casebook/favicon.ico  && mkdirp public/casebook/data/  && ncp data/images public/casebook/data/images  && ncp src/images public/casebook/images
scripts.copy:publish: mkdirp publish/casebook && ncp src/favicon.ico publish/casebook/favicon.ico && mkdirp publish/casebook/data/ && ncp data/images publish/casebook/data/images && ncp src/images publish/casebook/images && ncp README.md publish/casebook/README.md && ncp src/.nojekyll publish/casebook/.nojekyll
scripts.publish: npm run validate-schema && npm run resize-images && npm run clean:publish && npm run copy:publish && npm run build:publish && npm run gh-pages
scripts.start: npm run validate-schema && npm run resize-images && npm run clean         && npm run copy         && concurrently "npm run build"            "npm run start-server-and-open-browser"
scripts.start:production: npm run validate-schema && npm run resize-images && npm run clean         && npm run copy         && concurrently "npm run build:production" "npm run start-server-and-open-browser"
scripts.start:publish: npm run validate-schema && npm run resize-images && npm run clean:publish && npm run copy:publish && concurrently "npm run build:publish"    "npm run start-server-and-open-browser:publish"
scripts.start-server-and-open-browser: start-server-and-test 'npm run server'         'http://localhost:8080/casebook/index.html' 'npm run open && node -e "setTimeout(function(){}, Math.pow(2, 31) - 1)"'
scripts.start-server-and-open-browser:publish: start-server-and-test 'npm run server:publish' 'http://localhost:8080/casebook/index.html' 'npm run open && node -e "setTimeout(function(){}, Math.pow(2, 31) - 1)"'
scripts.test: npm run validate-schema && npm run eslint
